channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: RIP Old VC Playbook: How Investors Are Rethinking AI Startups Diligence
item.description: The traditional rules of SaaS investing are being challenged. AI startups require a new kind of diligence. Here’s how investors are approaching them.

item.title: TikTok Transforms Publishing: BookTok's Influence At The L.A. Times Festival Of Books
item.description: BookTok, TikTok’s literary corner, has turned casual reader posts into a force that sells books, builds careers, and shapes Hollywood deals.

item.title: The Counterintuitive AI Strategy That Small Businesses Need
item.description: Focus first on what won't change in your business over the next decade, then apply AI to only those elements.

item.title: What do you need more of?
item.description: If our day (and our work) would get better if we had more: …we know where to get it. If not, then why are we spending our magical attention there?
